fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Trade, Consumers, Culture, Customs
head_office_address: Syndicat National des Antiquaires 17, bd Malesherbes (3e étage)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Recognized by the sign of the Syndicat National des Antiquaires, the members are united with a common code of ethics: Authenticity - Quality - Honourability.  
 
They give, to the collectors and buyers in general, all the possible warranties for purchases and sales, as well as general and estate valuations.  
 
The antique dealers, members of the Syndicat National des Antiquaires, contribute efficiently to the protection of the French heritage by identifying and valuing art objects, and by bringing their knowledge for their preservation and their conservation.
